name: House Of The Trapped
description: This is the DEMO version we have put the full version on hold. THIS GAME WILL CREATE AN ATMOSPHERE  THAT WILL SEND  SEND SHIVERS  DOWN  YOUR  SPINE.  THIS GAME IS BASED IN AN EGYPTIAN PYRAMID TOMB WHERE YOU MUST ESCAPE.  SO OPEN YOUR COMPUTER, PREPARE YOUR  KEYBOARD AND FINGERS FOR AN ADVENTURE TO ANOTHER REALM . SO LETS GO!  I T IS NOT  FOR  THE  FAINTHEARTED  GAMER. Contact us at: high_rise_help@outlook.com
